mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes the articles entitled: SQUARE DANCES "Runouttanames", "Shuffle Star", and "Barnacle Bill". ROUND DANCES "Juanita Waltz", and "Whispering". SPECIAL FEATURES "Square Dancing Never Left Home", "Square Dancing on TV", "So You're Single", and "The Round Dance Today". REGULAR FEATURES "As I See It", "Women on the Square", "Square of the Month (Brownie Brown)", "'Round the Outside Ring", "From the Floor", "Calendar of Square Dancing Events", and "On the Record". THE GREEN SHEET.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
